statements.english: to ask questions at any time
the teacher permits asking questions at any time
to work from home on Fridays

statements.chinese: 公司允许在周五居家办公
statements.english: the company permits working from home on Fridays
to listen to music during the break

statements.chinese: 在休息期间听音乐(ing形式)
statements.english: listening to music during the break

statements.chinese: 老师允许在休息期间听音乐
statements.english: the teacher permits listening to music during the break

statements.chinese: 听音乐或者玩游戏(ing形式)
statements.english: listening to music or playing games

statements.chinese: 老师允许在休息期间听音乐或者玩游戏
statements.english: the teacher permits listening to music or playing games during the break

statements.chinese: 老师允许在这个测验期间使用计算器
statements.english: the teacher permits using calculators during the test
to drink water before the blood test

statements.chinese: 在血液测试之前喝水(ing形式)
statements.english: drinking water before the blood test

statements.chinese: 医生允许在血液测试之前喝水
statements.english: the doctor permits drinking water before the blood test

statements.chinese: 你拥有一个有效的执照
如果你拥有一个有效的执照
statements.english: if you have a valid license

statements.chinese: 政策允许开车如果你拥有一个有效的执照
statements.english: the policy permits driving if you have a valid license

statements.chinese: 你拥有一个有效的护照
如果你拥有一个有效的护照
statements.english: if you have a valid passport

statements.chinese: 政策允许出国旅行如果你拥有一个有效的护照
statements.english: the policy permits traveling abroad if you have a valid passport

statements.chinese: 我们不允许在办公室里抽烟
statements.english: we don't permit smoking in the office

statements.chinese: 我们禁止在办公室里抽烟
statements.english: we prohibit smoking in the office

statements.chinese: 我们禁止在公共场所抽烟
和一个有效的执照一起驾驶
statements.english: to drive with a valid license
to drive without a valid license
the law prohibits driving without a valid license

statements.chinese: 从其他人那里抄作业(ing形式)
老师禁止从其他人那里抄作业
statements.english: the teacher prohibits copying homework from others

statements.chinese: 在这个测验期间说笑(ing形式)
statements.english: talking or laughing during the test

statements.chinese: 老师禁止在这个测验期间说笑
statements.english: the teacher prohibits talking or laughing during the test
eating or drinking in the classroom

statements.chinese: 学校禁止在教室里吃喝
statements.english: the school prohibits eating or drinking in the classroom
